section.p: A Diagnostic Imaging Report (DIR) is a document that contains a consulting specialist's interpretation of image data. It conveys the interpretation to the referring (ordering) physician and becomes part of the patient's medical record. It is for use in Radiology, Endoscopy, Cardiology, and other imaging specialties.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-8404, CONF:1198-10042, CONF:1198-32515 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.5"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to US Realm Header2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1:2015-08-01)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1198-30932)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14833), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet LOINC Imaging Document Codes 1.3.6.1.4.1.12009.10.2.5 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-14834)
Preferred code is 18748-4 LOINC Diagnostic Imaging Report

SHALL contain [0..0] informant such that it (CONF:1198-8410)
Conforms to Informant12 from CDA

MAY contain [0..*] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:1198-8411)
informationRecipient
Conforms to Information Recipient from CDA

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8414)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-31198)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedPerson such that it (CONF:1198-31199)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1198-31200)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf such that it (CONF:1198-30936)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] order such that it (CONF:1198-30937)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-30938)
Note: DICOM Accession Number in the DICOM imaging and report data

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf such that it (CONF:1198-8416)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent such that it (CONF:1198-8431)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1198-8430)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:1198-8418)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-8419)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer, where its type is Physician Reading Study Performer2 (CONF:1198-8422)
The value of serviceEvent/code SHALL NOT conflict with the ClininicalDocument/code. When transforming from DICOM SR documents that do not contain a procedure code, an appropriate nullFlavor SHALL be used on serviceEvent/code (CONF:1198-8420)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] relatedDocument such that it (CONF:1198-8432)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] parentDocument such that it (CONF:1198-32089)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1198-32090)
When a Diagnostic Imaging Report has been transformed from a DICOM SR document, relatedDocument/@typeCode SHALL be XFRM, and relatedDocument/parentDocument/id SHALL contain the SOP Instance UID of the original DICOM SR document (CONF:1198-8433)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf such that it (CONF:1198-30939)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter such that it (CONF:1198-30940)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-30941)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-30943)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] responsibleParty such that it (CONF:1198-30945)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-30946)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson OR contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:1198-30947)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] encounterParticipant, where its type is Physicianof Record Participant2 (CONF:1198-30948)
id In the case of transformed DICOM SR documents, an appropriate null flavor MAY be used if the id is unavailable (CONF:1198-30942)

SHALL contain [1..1] component such that it (CONF:1198-30696, CONF:1198-30697)
Conforms to Findings Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.2)

SHOULD contain [0..1] component such that it (CONF:1198-30698, CONF:1198-30699)
Conforms to DICOM Object Catalog Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:1198-14907)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] structuredBody such that it (CONF:1198-30695)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-31055)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section such that it (CONF:1198-31056)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-31057), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet DIRSectionTypeCodes 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.59 STATIC (CONF:1198-31207)
For sections listed in the DIR Section Type Codes table, the code element must contain a LOINC code or DCM code for sections that have no LOINC equivalent. Note: The section/code SHOULD be selected from LOINC or DICOM for sections not listed in the DIR Section Type Codes table.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] title (CONF:1198-31058)
There is no equivalent to section/title in DICOM SR, so for a CDA to SR transformation, the section/code will be transferred and the title element will be dropped.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:1198-31059)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] subject such that it (CONF:1198-31215)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject, where its type is Fetus Subject Context (CONF:1198-31216)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31217)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observerContext, where its type is Observer Context (CONF:1198-31218)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is Procedure Context (CONF:1198-31213, CONF:1198-31214)
If the service context of a section is different from the value specified in documentationOf/serviceEvent, then the section SHALL contain one or more entries containing Procedure Context (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.5), which will reset the context for any clinical statements nested within those elements
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is Text Observation (CONF:1198-31357, CONF:1198-31358)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is Code Observations (CONF:1198-31359, CONF:1198-31360)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is Quantity Measurement Observation (CONF:1198-31361, CONF:1198-31362)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is SOP Instance Observation (CONF:1198-31363, CONF:1198-31364)
If clinical statements are present, the section/text SHALL represent faithfully all such statements and MAY contain additional text (CONF:1198-31060)
All text elements SHALL contain content. Text elements SHALL contain PCDATA or child elements (CONF:1198-31061)
The text elements (and their children) MAY contain Web Access to DICOM Persistent Object (WADO) references to DICOM objects by including a linkHtml element where @href is a valid WADO URL and the text content of linkHtml is the visible text of the hyperlink (CONF:1198-31062)
All sections defined in the DIR Section Type Codes table SHALL be top-level sections (CONF:1198-31211)
SHALL contain at least one text element or one or more component elements (CONF:1198-31212)

The physician requesting the imaging procedure (ClinicalDocument/participant[@typeCode=REF]/associatedEntity), if present, SHOULD also be recorded as an informationRecipient, unless in the local setting another physician (such as the attending physician for an inpatient) is known to be the appropriate recipient of the report (CONF:1198-8412)

When no referring physician is present, as in the case of self-referred screening examinations allowed by law, the intendedRecipient MAY be absent. The intendedRecipient MAY also be the health chart of the patient, in which case the receivedOrganization SHALL be the scoping organization of that chart (CONF:1198-8413)
The DICOM Object Catalog section (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1), if present, SHALL be the first section in the document Body (CONF:1198-31206)
SHALL conform to General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
SHALL conform to US Realm Header2 template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1:2015-08-01)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CONF:1198-16791)
realmCode
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:5361, R2.1=CONF:1198-5361)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1198-30932)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-14833), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet LOINC Imaging Document Codes 1.3.6.1.4.1.12009.10.2.5 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-14834)
Preferred code is 18748-4 LOINC Diagnostic Imaging Report

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:1198-5254)
Note: The title can either be a locally defined name or the displayName corresponding to clinicalDocument/code

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:5256, R2.1=CONF:1198-5256)
Signifies the document creation time, when the document first came into being. Where the CDA document is a transform from an original document in some other format, the ClinicalDocument.effectiveTime is the time the original document is created. The time when the transform occurred is not currently represented in CDA

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet HL7 BasicConfidentialityKind 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16926 STATIC 2010-04-21 (CONF:5259, R2.1=CONF:1198-5259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:5372, R2.1=CONF:1198-5372, DSTU:806)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:5261, R2.1=CONF:1198-5261)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264, R2.1=CONF:1198-5264)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget such that it (CONF:1198-5266)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patientRole such that it (CONF:1198-5267)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5268, R2.1=CONF:1198-5268)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5271, R2.1=CONF:1198-5271)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5280, R2.1=CONF:1198-5280)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] providerOrganization such that it (CONF:5416, R2.1=CONF:1198-5416)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5417, R2.1=CONF:1198-5417)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5419, R2.1=CONF:1198-5419)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5420, R2.1=CONF:1198-5420)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5422, R2.1=CONF:1198-5422)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] id where id/@root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:9996, R2.1=CONF:1198-16820)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] patient such that it (CONF:1198-5283)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5284, CONF:10411, R2.1=CONF:1198-5284, DSTU:808)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] administrativeGenderCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Administrative Gender (HL7 V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:6394, R2.1=CONF:1198-6394)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] maritalStatusCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Marital Status 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12212 DYNAMIC (CONF:5303, R2.1=CONF:1198-5303)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] religiousAffiliationCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 Religious Affiliation 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19185 DYNAMIC (CONF:5317, R2.1=CONF:1198-5317)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCRaceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.14914 DYNAMIC (CONF:7263, R2.1=CONF:1198-7263)
Note: The sdtc:raceCode is only used to record additional values when the patient has indicated multiple races or additional race detail beyond the five categories required for Meaningful Use Stage 2. The prefix sdtc: SHALL be bound to the namespace "urn:hl7-org:sdtc". The use of the namespace provides a necessary extension to CDA R2 for the use of the additional raceCode elements.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] raceCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Race Category Excluding Nulls 2.16.840.1.113883.3.2074.1.1.3 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5322)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] ethnicGroupCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet EthnicityGroup 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5323)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] birthTime (CONF:1198-5298)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] sDTCEthnicGroupCode (ethnicGroupCode) (1198-32901), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Detailed Ethnicity 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.877 STATIC
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] guardian such that it (CONF:1198-5325)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] addr (CONF:5359, CONF:10413, R2.1=CONF:1198-5359)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Personal And Legal Relationship Role Type 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.12.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5326)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] telecom (CONF:1198-5382)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] guardianPerson such that it (CONF:5385, R2.1=CONF:1198-5385)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5386, R2.1=CONF:1198-5386)
The content of name SHALL be a conformant US Realm Person Name (PTN.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.1.1) (CONF:10414, R2.1=CONF:1198-5386)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] languageCommunication such that it (CONF:1198-5406)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] modeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HL7 LanguageAbilityMode 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12249 STATIC 1 (CONF:5409, R2.1=CONF:1198-5409)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] proficiencyLevelCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet LanguageAbilityProficiency 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12199 DYNAMIC (CONF:9965, R2.1=CONF:1198-9965)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Language 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5407)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] preferenceInd (CONF:1198-5414)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] birthplace such that it (CONF:1198-5395)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] place such that it (CONF:1198-5396)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:5397, R2.1=CONF:1198-5397)
If country is US, this addr SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] state, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet StateValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.1 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-5402). Note: A nullFlavor of 'UNK' may be used if the state is unknown. (CONF:1198-5402)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer such that it (CONF:1198-5441)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-5442)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5443, R2.1=CONF:1198-5443)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5460, R2.1=CONF:1198-5460)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5466, R2.1=CONF:1198-5466)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32173)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:5469, R2.1=CONF:1198-5469)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470, R2.1=CONF:1198-5470)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-5444)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5445, R2.1=CONF:1198-5445)
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
The content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:16866).
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedAuthor such that it (CONF:1198-5448)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5449, R2.1=CONF:1198-5449)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5452, R2.1=CONF:1198-5452)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5428, R2.1=CONF:1198-5428)
contain zero or one [0..1] code
Since the assignedAuthor is an assignedPerson, the assignedAuthor SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, and this code, if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-16788)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedAuthoringDevice such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturerModelName (CONF:16784, R2.1=CONF:1198-16784)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] softwareName (CONF:16785, R2.1=CONF:1198-16785)
contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson such that it
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:16789, R2.1=CONF:1198-16789)
Since the assignedAuthor is an assignedPerson, the assignedAuthor SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:1198-16787)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian such that it (CONF:1198-5519)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedCustodian such that it (CONF:5520, R2.1=CONF:1198-5520)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] representedCustodianOrganization such that it (CONF:5521, R2.1=CONF:1198-5521)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5522, R2.1=CONF:1198-5522)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5524, R2.1=CONF:1198-5524)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] telecom (CONF:5525, R2.1=CONF:1198-5525)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] addr (CONF:5559, R2.1=CONF:1198-5559)
The id SHOULD include zero or one [0..1] @root ="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16822, R2.1=CONF:1198-16822)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:1198-5565)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] intendedRecipient such that it (CONF:1198-5566)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:1198-32399)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:5568, R2.1=CONF:1198-5567)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5470, R2.1=CONF:1198-5568)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] receivedOrganization such that it (CONF:5577, R2.1=CONF:1198-5577)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:5578, R2.1=CONF:1198-5578)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator such that it (CONF:1198-5579)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5580, R2.1=CONF:1198-5580)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode (CONF:5583, R2.1=CONF:1198-5583)/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5584, R2.1=CONF:1198-5584)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCSignatureText (CONF:1198-30810)
sdtc:signatureText The sdtc:signatureText extension provides a location in CDA for a textual or multimedia depiction of the signature by which the participant endorses and accepts responsibility for his or her participation in the Act as specified in the Participation.typeCode. Details of what goes in the field are described in the HL7 CDA Digital Signature Standard balloted in Fall of 2013.
Note: The signature can be represented either inline or by reference according to the ED data type. Typical cases for CDA are:
1) Electronic signature: this attribute can represent virtually any electronic signature scheme.
2) Digital signature: this attribute can represent digital signatures by reference to a signature data block that is constructed in accordance to a digital signature standard, such as XML-DSIG, PKCS#7, PGP, etc.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:5585, R2.1=CONF:1198-5585)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5586, R2.1=CONF:1198-5586)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:17000, R2.1=CONF:1198-17000)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5589, R2.1=CONF:1198-5589)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] telecom (CONF:5595, R2.1=CONF:1198-5595)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:5597, R2.1=CONF:1198-5597)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5598, R2.1=CONF:1198-5598)
The id MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16823, R2.1=CONF:1198-16823)
time content SHALL be a conformant US Realm Date and Time (DTM.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4) (CONF:1198-29402)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator such that it (CONF:1198-5607)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] time (CONF:5608, R2.1=CONF:1198-5608)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] signatureCode (CONF:5610, R2.1=CONF:1198-5610)/@code="S" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.89 Participationsignature) (CONF:5611, R2.1=CONF:1198-5611)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] sDTCSignatureText (CONF:1198-30811)
The sdtc:signatureText extension provides a location in CDA for a textual or multimedia depiction of the signature by which the participant endorses and accepts responsibility for his or her participation in the Act as specified in the Participation.typeCode. Details of what goes in the field are described in the HL7 CDA Digital Signature Standard balloted in Fall of 2013.
Note: The signature can be represented either inline or by reference according to the ED data type. Typical cases for CDA are:
1) Electronic signature: this attribute can represent virtually any electronic signature scheme.
2) Digital signature: this attribute can represent digital signatures by reference to a signature data block that is constructed in accordance to a digital signature standard, such as XML-DSIG, PKCS#7, PGP, etc.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:5612, R2.1=CONF:1198-5612)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:5613, R2.1=CONF:1198-5613)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16825, R2.1=CONF:1198-16825), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:16826, R2.1=CONF:1198-16826)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:5616, R2.1=CONF:1198-5616)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:5625, R2.1=CONF:1198-5625)
The id SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.4.6" National Provider Identifier (CONF:16824, R2.1=CONF:1198-16824)

contain zero or one [0..1] assignedEntity such that it

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-32174)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:1198-8220)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson such that it (CONF:8221, R2.1=CONF:1198-8221)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:8222, CONF:10420, R2.1=CONF:1198-8222)
contain zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity such that it
contain [0..0] addr
contain [0..0] relatedPerson, where its type is CDA Person
SHALL satisfy: contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity OR exactly one [1..1] relatedEntity (CONF:1198-8002, CONF:1198-31356)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf such that it (CONF:1198-9952)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] order such that it (CONF:9953, R2.1=CONF:1198-9953)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9954, R2.1=CONF:1198-9954)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf such that it (CONF:1198-9955)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter such that it (CONF:1198-9956)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:9959, R2.1=CONF:1198-9959)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:9958, R2.1=CONF:1198-9958)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1198-10003)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] time (CONF:10004, R2.1=CONF:1198-10004)
SHALL contain associatedEntity/associatedPerson AND/OR associatedEntity/scopingOrganization (CONF:1198-10006)
When participant/@typeCode is IND, associatedEntity/@classCode SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.33 INDRoleclassCodes STATIC 2011-09-30 (CONF:1198-10007)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] documentationOf such that it (CONF:1198-14835)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent such that it (CONF:1198-14836)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:14837, R2.1=CONF:1198-14837)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1198-14839)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode (CONF:14840, R2.1=CONF:1198-14840)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] functionCode (CONF:1198-16818), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet ParticipationFunction 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10267 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1198-32889)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-14841)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:14846, R2.1=CONF:1198-14846)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-14842)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authorization such that it (CONF:1198-16792)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consent such that it (CONF:16793, R2.1=CONF:1198-16793)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:16794, R2.1=CONF:1198-16794)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:16795, R2.1=CONF:1198-16795)
The type of consent (e.g., a consent to perform the related serviceEvent) is conveyed in consent/code.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:16797, R2.1=CONF:1198-16797)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:16798, R2.1=CONF:1198-16798)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant such that it (CONF:1198-8414)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-31198)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedPerson such that it (CONF:1198-31199)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:1198-31200)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf such that it (CONF:1198-30936)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] order such that it (CONF:1198-30937)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-30938)
Note: DICOM Accession Number in the DICOM imaging and report data

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf such that it (CONF:1198-8416)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent such that it (CONF:1198-8431)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1198-8430)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:1198-8418)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-8419)
SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer, where its type is Physician Reading Study Performer2 (CONF:1198-8422)
The value of serviceEvent/code SHALL NOT conflict with the ClininicalDocument/code. When transforming from DICOM SR documents that do not contain a procedure code, an appropriate nullFlavor SHALL be used on serviceEvent/code (CONF:1198-8420)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] relatedDocument such that it (CONF:1198-8432)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] parentDocument such that it (CONF:1198-32089)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:1198-32090)
When a Diagnostic Imaging Report has been transformed from a DICOM SR document, relatedDocument/@typeCode SHALL be XFRM, and relatedDocument/parentDocument/id SHALL contain the SOP Instance UID of the original DICOM SR document (CONF:1198-8433)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf such that it (CONF:1198-30939)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter such that it (CONF:1198-30940)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1198-30941)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1198-30943)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] responsibleParty such that it (CONF:1198-30945)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity such that it (CONF:1198-30946)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson OR contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:1198-30947)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] encounterParticipant, where its type is Physicianof Record Participant2 (CONF:1198-30948)
id In the case of transformed DICOM SR documents, an appropriate null flavor MAY be used if the id is unavailable (CONF:1198-30942)

SHALL contain [1..1] component such that it (CONF:1198-30696, CONF:1198-30697)
Conforms to Findings Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.2)

SHOULD contain [0..1] component such that it (CONF:1198-30698, CONF:1198-30699)
Conforms to DICOM Object Catalog Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component such that it (CONF:1198-14907)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] structuredBody such that it (CONF:1198-30695)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] component such that it (CONF:1198-31055)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] section such that it (CONF:1198-31056)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-31057), which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet DIRSectionTypeCodes 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.59 STATIC (CONF:1198-31207)
For sections listed in the DIR Section Type Codes table, the code element must contain a LOINC code or DCM code for sections that have no LOINC equivalent. Note: The section/code SHOULD be selected from LOINC or DICOM for sections not listed in the DIR Section Type Codes table.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] title (CONF:1198-31058)
There is no equivalent to section/title in DICOM SR, so for a CDA to SR transformation, the section/code will be transferred and the title element will be dropped.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:1198-31059)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] subject such that it (CONF:1198-31215)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedSubject, where its type is Fetus Subject Context (CONF:1198-31216)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1198-31217)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observerContext, where its type is Observer Context (CONF:1198-31218)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is Procedure Context (CONF:1198-31213, CONF:1198-31214)
If the service context of a section is different from the value specified in documentationOf/serviceEvent, then the section SHALL contain one or more entries containing Procedure Context (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.2.5), which will reset the context for any clinical statements nested within those elements
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is Text Observation (CONF:1198-31357, CONF:1198-31358)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is Code Observations (CONF:1198-31359, CONF:1198-31360)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is Quantity Measurement Observation (CONF:1198-31361, CONF:1198-31362)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is SOP Instance Observation (CONF:1198-31363, CONF:1198-31364)
If clinical statements are present, the section/text SHALL represent faithfully all such statements and MAY contain additional text (CONF:1198-31060)
All text elements SHALL contain content. Text elements SHALL contain PCDATA or child elements (CONF:1198-31061)
The text elements (and their children) MAY contain Web Access to DICOM Persistent Object (WADO) references to DICOM objects by including a linkHtml element where @href is a valid WADO URL and the text content of linkHtml is the visible text of the hyperlink (CONF:1198-31062)
All sections defined in the DIR Section Type Codes table SHALL be top-level sections (CONF:1198-31211)
SHALL contain at least one text element or one or more component elements (CONF:1198-31212)
typeId SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3" (CONF:5250, R2.1=CONF:1198-5250)
typeId SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="POCD_HD000040" (CONF:5251, R2.1=CONF:1198-5251)
id SHALL be a globally unique identifier for the document (CONF:9991, R2.1=CONF:1198-9991)
code SHALL specify the particular kind of document (e.g. History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note). (CONF:9992, R2.1=CONF:1198-9992)
If setId is present versionNumber SHALL be present (CONF:6380, R2.1=CONF:1198-6380)
If versionNumber is present setId SHALL be present (CONF:6387, R2.1=CONF:1198-6387)

The physician requesting the imaging procedure (ClinicalDocument/participant[@typeCode=REF]/associatedEntity), if present, SHOULD also be recorded as an informationRecipient, unless in the local setting another physician (such as the attending physician for an inpatient) is known to be the appropriate recipient of the report (CONF:1198-8412)

When no referring physician is present, as in the case of self-referred screening examinations allowed by law, the intendedRecipient MAY be absent. The intendedRecipient MAY also be the health chart of the patient, in which case the receivedOrganization SHALL be the scoping organization of that chart (CONF:1198-8413)
The DICOM Object Catalog section (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1), if present, SHALL be the first section in the document Body (CONF:1198-31206)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8404, CONF:10042 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.5"
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report This code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @code="18748-4" Diagnostic Imaging Report (CodeSystem: LOINC2.16.840.1.113883.6.1) (CONF:8409)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report The DICOM Object Catalog section (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1), if present, SHALL be the first section in the document Body

Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report With the exception of the DICOM Object Catalog (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1), all sections within the Diagnostic Imaging Report content SHOULD contain a title element (CONF:9409)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report The section/code SHOULD be selected from LOINC or DICOM for sections not listed in the DIR Section Type Codes table (CONF:9410)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report All sections defined in the DIR Section Type Codes table SHALL be top-level sections (CONF:9411)

Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report A section element SHALL have a code element which SHALL contain a LOINC code or DCM code for sections which have no LOINC equivalent. This only applies to sections described inthe DIR Section Type Codes table (CONF:9412)

Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report Apart from the DICOM Object Catalog (templateId 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1), all other instances of section SHALL contain at least one text element or one or more component elements (CONF:9413)

Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report All text or component elements SHALL contain content. text elements SHALL contain PCDATA or child elements, and component elements SHALL contain child elements (CONF:9414)

Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report The text elements (and their children) MAY contain Web Access to DICOM Persistent Object (WADO) references to DICOM objects by including a linkHtml element where @href is a valid WADO URL and the text content of linkHtml is the visible text of the hyperlink
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report If clinical statements are present, the section/text SHALL represent faithfully all such statements and MAY contain additional text
SHALL conform to General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:14833), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet DIRDocumentTypeCodes 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.32 DYNAMIC (CONF:14834)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:5363)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report SHALL contain [0..0] informant such that it (CONF:8410) Conforms to Informant12 from CDA
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report MAY contain [0..*] informationRecipient such that it (CONF:8411) Conforms to Information Recipient from CDA
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant, where its type is Participant (CONF:8414)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report MAY contain zero or one [0..1] inFulfillmentOf, where its type is In Fulfillment Of
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] documentationOf, where its type is Documentation Of (CONF:8416)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report MAY contain zero or one [0..1] relatedDocument, where its type is Related Document (CONF:8432)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report MAY contain zero or one [0..1] componentOf, where its type is Component Of (CONF:8434)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report SHALL contain [1..1] component such that it (CONF:9484) Conforms to Findings Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.2)
Consol Diagnostic Imaging Report SHOULD contain [0..1] component such that it (CONF:15141) Conforms to DICOM Object Catalog Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.6.1.1)
Consol Participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedEntity, where its type is Associated Entity (CONF:8415)
Consol Associated Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] associatedPerson, where its type is Person (CONF:8415)
Consol Person SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] name (CONF:9406)
Consol Documentation Of SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] serviceEvent, where its type is Service Event4 (CONF:8431)
Consol Service Event4 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:8430)
Consol Service Event4 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:8419)
Consol Service Event4 SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id (CONF:8418)
Consol Service Event4 SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] performer, where its type is Physician Reading Study Performer (CONF:8422)
Consol Related Document The relatedDocument/id/@root attribute SHALL be a syntactically correct OID, and SHALL NOT be a UUID. (CONF:10030)
Consol Component Of SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] encompassingEncounter, where its type is Encompassing Encounter7 (CONF:8449)
Consol Encompassing Encounter7 The content of effectiveTime conforms to US Realm Date and Time (DT.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4). SHALL be precise to the day (CONF:10133, CONF:10127)

Consol Encompassing Encounter7 The content of effectiveTime conforms to US Realm Date and Time (DT.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4). SHOULD be precise to the minute (CONF:10133, CONF:10128)
Consol Encompassing Encounter7 The content of effectiveTime conforms to US Realm Date and Time (DT.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4). MAY be precise to the second (CONF:10133, CONF:10129)

Consol Encompassing Encounter7 The content of effectiveTime conforms to US Realm Date and Time (DT.US.FIELDED) (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.5.4). If more precise than day, SHOULD include time-zone offset (CONF:10133, CONF:10130)
Consol Encompassing Encounter7 SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:8437)
Consol Encompassing Encounter7 SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:8435)
Consol Encompassing Encounter7 SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] encounterParticipant, where its type is Physicianof Record Participant (CONF:8448)
Consol Encompassing Encounter7 MAY contain zero or one [0..1] responsibleParty, where its type is Responsible Party (CONF:8438)
Consol Responsible Party SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity, where its type is Assigned Entity (CONF:9407)
Consol Assigned Entity SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] assignedPerson OR contain zero or one [0..1] representedOrganization (CONF:8439)
